item.title: About us
item.description: Stevbros is the Registered Education Provider ID 3807 of Project Management Institute USA. Stevbros designs, customizes and delivers project management in-house training courses for enterprises in Asia in various industries: IT, software, constructions, oil and gas, services, manufacturing, government projects, ADB/ WorldBank/ ODA projects.

item.title: Project Management Training
item.description: Project Management Training, PMP® Exam Prep 35 PDUs lowest price, 60 PDUs Renew PMP® Certificate after every 3 years lowest price

item.title: 35 contact hours vs. 35 PDUs, which one is the best choice for PMP® Exam Prep
item.description: Contact hour is training hour, which can be earned from any training course related project management. PDU standing for Professional Development Unit is one kind of contact hour and PDU is pre-approved contact hour while other kinds of contact hour can be selected for audit by PMI.

item.title: In-house Training Courses and Certificates
item.description: Courses and Certificates

item.title: Project Management Competency Assessment
item.description: Stevbros provides a project management competency assessment framework for determining, measuring, and supporting the improvement of an individuals’ performance through a quiz and a survey to evaluate project management competencies.

item.title: Online Courses, Online PDUs
item.description: Stevbros’ Online Training System provides PMP® Exam Preparation 35 PDUs course, PMP® Exam Mock Tests course, and Renew PMP® Certificate 60 PDUs course globally with most competitive price. As a PMI Registered Education Provider (R.E.P.), Stevbros has agreed to abide by PMI® established quality assurance criteria.

item.title: Study in Singapore - USA
item.description: Our goal at Stevbros is to provide effective solutions designed to help our clients choose right field of study, right school, shorten their study, shorten their stay and save their budget while at the same time keeping high satisfaction in study quality, 100% guarantee for internationally recognized degree and big success.

item.title: Emotional Intelligence for Project Managers Course
item.description: Duration: 2 days. Who should attend: Project Managers, Team Leads, Program Managers, PMO Staff, Technical Leads, QA Leads, QC Leads, BA Leads.

item.title: Effective Project Management Skills Course
item.description: Duration: 3 days. Who should attend: project managers, project coordinators, project assistants or subject matter experts on project teams.

item.title: Accelerated PMP® Exam Prep Course
item.description: Duration: 2 days. Who should attend: For anyone planning to take PMP exam. This directed study course is designed to prepare you for the PMP exam in effective manner with a minimum amount of studying after class!

item.title: PMBOK & PMP® Exam Prep Course
item.description: Duration: 5 days. Who should attend: Project Managers, Team Leads, Program Managers, PMO Staff, Technical Leads, QA Leads, QC Leads, BA Leads.

item.title: PMP® Exam Prep 35 PDUs lowest price
item.description: Are you looking for an online training course to solidify your project management skills and knowledge? Are you looking for an online PMP® exam preparation course? Are you looking for PMP® exam preparation quizzes to identify gaps in your knowledge that may hurt you on the exam? Are you looking for a certificate of 35 PDUs to apply for PMP® exam?

item.title: PMP® Mock Tests simulating the real PMP® exam
item.description: You obtained certificate of 35 PDUs. You deeply understood project management knowledge according to PMBOK 5th edition of Project Management Institute. You are ready for PMP® exam. You need some mock tests to gain more confidence before attending your real PMP® exam.

item.title: 60 PDUs Renew PMP® Certificate after every 3 years lowest price
item.description: Is your PMP® certificate going to expired? Are you looking for a certificate of 60 PDUs from a Registered Education Provider (R.E.P) of Project Management Institute (PMI) to renew your PMP® certificate? Do you need the lasted update of PMBOK 5th edition because you obtain PMP® certificate with PMBOK 4th edition? Do you need the lasted update of researches sponsored by PMI?

item.title: Payment
item.description: Payment

item.title: The easiest way to earn 60 PDUs for PMP® renewal with lowest price
item.description: to keep your PMP® in good standing, you must earn 60 PDUs every 3-year cycle, claim your 60 PDUs into PMI’s CCRS (stand for Project Management Institute’s Continuing Certification Requirements System), and then PMI will give approval to extend you PMP® cycle 3 more years

item.title: Emotional Intelligence for Project Managers
item.description: Project management is getting work done through people. To effectively lead a large team, build a strong relationship with project stakeholders, and archive the goals of the projects successfully, project managers need to learn, develop and apply Emotional Intelligence. It helps them recognize and regulate emotions in themselves and in others.

item.title: The concept of Emotional Intelligence for project management
item.description: We analyze Emotional Intelligence frameworks of Goleman and Mersino to understand the concept of Emotional Intelligence for project management and how Mersino adapted Goleman’s framework to project management

item.title: The competencies of project managers according to the PMBOK Guide
item.description: The competencies of project managers are described in ten knowledge areas and can be categorized into two groups: hard skills and interpersonal skills (also called soft skills).

item.title: Statistical figures of project management
item.description: The country with the highest median salary ($160,409 USD) is Switzerland, whereas the country with the lowest median salary is China ($23,207 USD).
